title: Facebook Says Access to Products Is Fixed After Latest Outage
sub_head: Social-media giant’s disruption Friday follows widespread outage earlier in week
body:
Facebook Inc. said access to its products was restored for users who experienced issues Friday, a disruption that came days after the social-media giant suffered an hourslong outage earlier this week.
“Sincere apologies to anyone who wasn’t able to access our products in the last couple of hours,” a Facebook representative said in a statement. “We fixed the issue, and everything should be back to normal now.”
